Package com.g1.mychess.player.service.impl

Class PlayerServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.g1.mychess.player.service.impl.PlayerServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerService
@Service public class PlayerServiceImpl extends Object implements PlayerService
Implementation of the PlayerService interface, providing services for managing players, including player creation, updating player details, following/unfollowing players, and player reporting.

    • followPlayer

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> followPlayer(Long followerId, Long followedId)
      Follows a player on behalf of the follower.
      Specified by:
      followPlayer in interface PlayerService
      Parameters:
      followerId - The ID of the follower player.
      followedId - The ID of the player to follow.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity indicating the result of the follow operation.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the follower attempts to follow themselves or if they are already following the player.

    • unfollowPlayer

      Specified by:
      unfollowPlayer in interface PlayerService
      Parameters:
      followerId - The ID of the follower player.
      followedId - The ID of the player to unfollow.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity indicating the result of the unfollow operation.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the follower is not following the player.
